column4: i have tryed to get my graphics card to work but im just not getting any joy. its a Nvidia Geforce2 GTS?Pro
i can't seem to get the drivers to load or install
that's an older card like the mx series.. you might need to look in Synaptic for the older drivers
if you have that you need to do some stuff before trying to install it.. first you have to uninstall all nvidia stuff listed as installed in Synaptic
hang on and I'll look at them..
you need nvidia-glx-legacy drivers for your card.. is that what you installed?
once installed you might find them listed in System>Admin>hardware drivers.. if they are there you'll be able to activate them.
well if you tag one called nvidia-glx-legacy and it wants to pull other stuff in then that's ok
if you tagged only the one I mentioned and it pulls the others then so be it.. hit apply and let her rip
you might look in synaptic for envy-ng and it will help install the right driver.
is the current graphics card agp?
it'd be worth looking on craigs list or ebay for something newer like an agp card in the 6000 series.. won't be expensive and much easier to configure.
